DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Occurrence Date and Time Range OMOP CDM Death Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation._The date the person was deceased. If the precise date including day or month is not known or not allowed, December is used as the default month, and the last day of the month the default day.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Occurrence Date and Time Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per model owner approval. mc 6/2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date the person was deceased. If the precise date including day or month is not known or not allowed, December is used as the default month, and the last day of the month the default day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
